dt: {bc}a word or word group functioning syntactically as a noun

et: Middle English {it}substantif{/it}, from Anglo-French {it}sustentif{/it}, from {it}sustentif{/it}, adjective, having or expressing substance, from Late Latin {it}substantivus{/it}, from Latin {it}substantia{/it}
shortdef: noun; broadly : a word or word group functioning syntactically as a noun
